dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Kazakhstan's just adding more days off, right? Actually, it's six new professional holidays, not public ones.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Kazakhstan's just adding more days off, right? Actually, it's six new professional holidays, not public ones.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kazakhstan will add six new professional holidays to its national calendar, according to a draft order proposed by the Ministry of Labor and Social Protection.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, that's a key distinction. So these are for specific industries, not nationwide time off.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, that's a key distinction. So these are for specific industries, not nationwide time off.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. And one of the changes is moving Power Engineers' Day from the third Sunday of December to a fixed date, December 22nd.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. And one of the changes is moving Power Engineers' Day from the third Sunday of December to a fixed date, December twenty second.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Instead of being observed on the third Sunday of December, it will now be celebrated annually on December 22.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Interesting—I wonder if that's to align with some historical event or just simplify scheduling.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Interesting-I wonder if that's to align with some historical event or just simplify scheduling.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Could be! The Ministry of Labor and Social Protection is behind the proposal, so they must've had their reasons.

dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kazakhstan will add six new professional holidays to its national calendar, according to a draft order proposed by the Ministry of Labor and Social Protection.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And they also confirmed an extra public holiday in June 2025, which is separate from these professional ones.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And they also confirmed an extra public holiday in June twenty twenty five, which is separate from these professional ones.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Earlier, the Ministry of Labor and Social Protection confirmed that Kazakhstanis will have an additional public holiday in June 2025.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Right, so workers in certain fields get their own recognition, while everyone gets that bonus day off next year.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, so workers in certain fields get their own recognition, while everyone gets that bonus day off next year.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: I like that approach—it celebrates specialized contributions without overloading the public calendar.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I like that approach-it celebrates specialized contributions without overloading the public calendar.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. It's a thoughtful way to honor different professions, you know, without disrupting the whole economy.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. It's a thoughtful way to honor different professions, you know, without disrupting the whole economy.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. Plus, shifting Power Engineers' Day to a fixed date might make it easier for people to plan around.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. Plus, shifting Power Engineers' Day to a fixed date might make it easier for people to plan around.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, no more guessing which Sunday it falls on. Smart move, honestly.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, no more guessing which Sunday it falls on. Smart move, honestly.

dialogue_turns.text: Do we know what the other five new professional holidays will be?

dialogue_turns.text: Not yet—the draft order just mentions they're adding six, but only specified the change for power engineers so far.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Not yet-the draft order just mentions they're adding six, but only specified the change for power engineers so far.

dialogue_turns.text: Definitely. Kazakhstan's diversifying its economy, so it makes sense to recognize emerging sectors too.
